resources.string: When you log in, you are by default an anonymous user. The only thing we display to other users is your @nickname.
It is up to you to decide how u use the app, you can remove your account anytime.
This app is going to revolutionize your @social experience!
Setup your @username here.\nIt is visible to all users in the app.
Username must be longer than 3 letters and can contain only letters or dots.
